english_example_sentence: If you cut the ripe pink grapefruit evenly, everyone will enjoy breakfast
russian_example_sentence: Если вы нарежете спелый розовый грейпфрут равномерно, все будут наслаждаться завтраком
turkish_example_sentence: Siz olgun pembe greyfurt eşit kesersanız, herkes kahvaltıdan hoşlanacak
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz olgun pembe greyfurt eşit ______, herkes kahvaltıdan hoşlanacak
